about_the_game:
The complete soundtrack for the murder mystery visual novel Detective Butler: Maiden Voyage Murder.

Contains 29 tracks in 128kbps mp3 format for a total duration of 1 hour and 3 minutes.

Tracklist:

00. Criminal-Search (1:27)
01. Title Screen (1:36)
02. Dance Party (2:26)
03. Flashback (1:24)
04. Realization (3:12)
05. The Butler Did It (1:36)
06. Another Boring Day (0:59)
07. On the Dock (2:24)
08. Vacation (2:13)
09. Dreaming (2:30)
10. Wealthy (0:49)
11. Reflections (2:36)
12. Lost and Found (1:54)
13. The World Cries (0:54)
14. Lightning Scars Abound (2:33)
15. Darkness (1:45)
16. Noble Cause (1:12)
17. Guess Who Died (2:42)
18. Aftermath (1:30)
19. Mysterious (2:24)
20. It's A Conspiracy (1:54)
21. Impossible Crime (2:37)
22. Search for Truth (1:06)
23. Boiler Room (4:48)
24. The Butler Solves It (2:17)
25. Confession (3:23)
26. Danger (4:40)
27. Justice (2:58)
28. Tomorrow (1:12)

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: XP
  • Processor: 400 MHz
  • Memory: 128 MB RAM
  • DirectX: Version 8.0
  • Storage: 60 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound card compatible with DirectSound

short_description: Complete soundtrack for the murder mystery visual novel Detective Butler: Maiden Voyage Murder.
